statement.p: Explain why the vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -5 \\ -2 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ 3 \\ 4 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -2 \\ -1 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 10 \\ 27 \\ 17 \\ -5 \end{array}\right] span or don't span \mathbb{R}^4.

answer.p: The vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -5 \\ -2 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ 3 \\ 4 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -2 \\ -1 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 10 \\ 27 \\ 17 \\ -5 \end{array}\right] do not span \mathbb{R}^4.
